column1: Therefore it is  clear that the Provincial  High  Courts derive its revisionary
jurisdiction from Article  154 P (3)  (b) and  not from  Article  154 P 4 (b) of
the Constitution.  Further,  revisionary jurisdiction of Provincial  High  Court is
a jurisdiction,  which  is  quite distinct from  its writ jurisdiction.
The Supreme Court in  the case  of Divisional  Secretary  Kalutara  V
